alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 9:34PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weber...eastern Cache...east central Box Elder and west central Rich Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 933 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Ogden, or 11 miles northeast of Ogden, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogden, North Ogden, Hyrum, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville, Mantua, South Willard, Pleasant View, Providence, Farr West, Harrisville, Plain City, Nibley, Millville, Paradise, Nordic Valley, Eden, Powder Mountain, Avon and Liberty. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 346 and 356. US Route 89 between mile markers 463 and 477. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
